slide.title: Question
slide.example:
Date: Fri, 25 Apr 2003 05:56:41 -0400 From: ***********@yahoo.com To: rasmus@php.net Subject: creating dynamic images
Hi, I just saw your article about creating dynamic images in PHP. Is it possible to do a similar thing in Visual Basic? I want to create a bar chart on the fly. Thanks in advace. Regards, Sid
>From IP Address: 137.132.3.12 >From Browser: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.1; YComp 5.0.0.0)
